comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Yep, there’s already an open issue. The endpoint is pending some backend support that should go out with the next release.

comments.author: Crell.6401
comments.body: Could we please get the Shared Account Inventory slots exposed to the API ? I was trying to figure out where I left something only to realize i’d accidentally put it in one of those slots.
